        public void addVertex(Person person)

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(Person p1,
                    Person p2)
        参数:
        p1 - one of the two connected people
        p2 - the other of the two connected people

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance(Person p1,
                       Person p2)
        参数:
        p1 - the person who connects
        p2 - the person who is connected
        返回:
        the distance between the two people p1 and p2
